verses.name: Psalms 64:1
verses.text: In finem. Psalmus David, canticum Jeremiæ et Ezechielis populo transmigrationis, cum inciperent exire.

verses.name: Psalms 64:2
verses.text: Te decet hymnus, Deus, in Sion,  et tibi reddetur votum in Jerusalem.

verses.name: Psalms 64:3
verses.text: Exaudi orationem meam ;  ad te omnis caro veniet.

verses.name: Psalms 64:4
verses.text: Verba iniquorum prævaluerunt super nos,  et impietatibus nostris tu propitiaberis.

verses.name: Psalms 64:5
verses.text: Beatus quem elegisti et assumpsisti :  inhabitabit in atriis tuis.  Replebimur in bonis domus tuæ ;  sanctum est templum tuum,

verses.name: Psalms 64:6
verses.text: mirabile in æquitate.  Exaudi nos, Deus, salutaris noster,  spes omnium finium terræ, et in mari longe.

verses.name: Psalms 64:7
verses.text: Præparans montes in virtute tua,  accinctus potentia ;

verses.name: Psalms 64:8
verses.text: qui conturbas profundum maris,  sonum fluctuum ejus.  Turbabuntur gentes,

verses.name: Psalms 64:9
verses.text: et timebunt qui habitant terminos a signis tuis ;  exitus matutini et vespere delectabis.

verses.name: Psalms 64:10
verses.text: Visitasti terram, et inebriasti eam ;  multiplicasti locupletare eam.  Flumen Dei repletum est aquis ; parasti cibum illorum :  quoniam ita est præparatio ejus.

verses.name: Psalms 64:11
verses.text: Rivos ejus inebria ;  multiplica genimina ejus :  in stillicidiis ejus lætabitur germinans.

verses.name: Psalms 64:12
verses.text: Benedices coronæ anni benignitatis tuæ,  et campi tui replebuntur ubertate.

verses.name: Psalms 64:13
verses.text: Pinguescent speciosa deserti,  et exsultatione colles accingentur.

verses.name: Psalms 64:14
verses.text: Induti sunt arietes ovium,  et valles abundabunt frumento ;  clamabunt, etenim hymnum dicent.
